attributes.action: Introduce a Motorway Driving Lesson as part of the UK driving Test
attributes.background: All too often new drivers take the UK motorways without any experience and are a danger to themselves and other road users. Can you Introduce Motorway Lessons either before or just after Completing the UK driving Test.

rejection.details:
Your petition has been rejected because we think it is similar to the following petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/131681

You might like to considering signing this petition.
